TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IEntityChangeTracker

summary.span: 定义对象服务用于跟踪对象属性更改的功能。

span.span: Defines the facilities that are used by Object Services to track changes that are made to the properties of an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和 是 Entity Data Model 工具生成的实体类型和复杂类型的基类。 and are the base classes for entity types and complex types generated by the Entity Data Model tools. 两个基类都使用 报告属性更改。Both base classes use to report property changes. 有关详细信息，请参阅[标识解析、状态管理和更改跟踪](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/bb896269(v=vs.100))和[跟踪 POCO 实体中的更改](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/52d2fc77-5c87-4082-a8e2-a2952ceb8461)。For more information, see [Identity Resolution, State Management, and Change Tracking](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/bb896269(v=vs.100)) and [Tracking Changes in POCO Entities](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/52d2fc77-5c87-4082-a8e2-a2952ceb8461).

param.span: 复杂类型上更改的属性的名称。

span.span: The name of the property that changed on complex type.

summary.span: 通知更改跟踪器，某个复杂类型的属性已更改。

span.span: Notifies the change tracker that a property of a complex type has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由 用来报告属性已更改。 is used by to report that a property has changed. 有关详细信息，请参阅[标识解析、状态管理和更改跟踪](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/bb896269(v=vs.100))和[跟踪 POCO 实体中的更改](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/52d2fc77-5c87-4082-a8e2-a2952ceb8461)。For more information, see [Identity Resolution, State Management, and Change Tracking](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/bb896269(v=vs.100)) and [Tracking Changes in POCO Entities](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/52d2fc77-5c87-4082-a8e2-a2952ceb8461).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和 使用 报告复杂属性正在更改。 is used by and to report that a complex property is changing. 有关详细信息，请参阅[标识解析、状态管理和更改跟踪](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/bb896269(v=vs.100))和[跟踪 POCO 实体中的更改](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/52d2fc77-5c87-4082-a8e2-a2952ceb8461)。For more information, see [Identity Resolution, State Management, and Change Tracking](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/bb896269(v=vs.100)) and [Tracking Changes in POCO Entities](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/52d2fc77-5c87-4082-a8e2-a2952ceb8461).
